abstract: California Gov Jerry Brown's office announces that legislation to introduce lessons about sexual consent into state's high schools has met with his approval; lessons about sexual violence are required at many colleges.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown approved legislation aimed at making California the first state in the nation to bring lessons about sexual consent required at many colleges into high schools, his office announced Thursday.

headline.main: California: Sexual Consent Lessons Now Required
headline.print_headline: California: Sexual Consent Lessons Now Required

snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown approved legislation aimed at making California the first state in the nation to bring lessons about sexual consent required at many colleges into high schools, his office announced Thursday.
